Package ddg.ui.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CampaignEditor
    This class is show campaign editor view
    CharacterPanel
    This class is to display information of a character during a game
    GamePanel
    Gaming panel, design to extends MapEditor, maybe need to refactor
    InventoryPanel
    This class to show InventoryPanel during playing
    InventoryView
    This class provides an interface to allow user to check a character's attributes, worn equipments and the backpack.
    ItemEditor
    This class is show item editor view
    MainPage
    This class is show main page
    MapEditor
    This class is show map editor view
    MapPanelInGame
    MapPanelInGame include the map of game, character detail and inventory detail
    OldCharactorEditor Deprecated
